options: ['A grown-up', 'A 10 - to-14 - year- old child', 'A 6 - to-10 - year- old child', 'A 3 - to- 6 - year- old child']
questions: For whom would a dose of two teaspoonfuls be given?
article:
Read the instructions of the medicine before you take your choices.
Adults : 2 tablespoonfuls 
Children: according to  age
10----14 years 4 teaspoonfuls 
5----10years 2 teaspoonfuls
3----6 years I teaspoonful
Repeat above doses  every 1/2 hour to 1 hour if needed until 8 dose are taken. If you do not get better within two days, see a doctor. SHAKE  WELLBEFORE USING.
